head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLENS, DR. BERTRAM

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLENS, DR. BERTRAM

block.p: POLLENS-Dr. Bertram. S ept. 8, 2000. Age 90. Renowned psychologist. Devoted husband of Polly for sixty years. Loving father to Martin, Richard, Linda Sherman and grandfather to Jason Pollens, Daniel and Benjamin Sherman. Services Sunday 11:15 AM, Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
